QuestData.Title: A Dark (Iron) Tide
QuestData.Description: Their red eyes... flaming beards... dark, dusky skin. These can only be Dark Iron dwarves. I have never seen one before this day.$b$bIt is my understanding that they have been sent here on an errand for the Alliance. Given my people's allegiance, I believe we are now placed in a position to better demonstrate our loyalty to the Horde.$b$bThe Dark Iron must die. See that they do not claim so much as an inch more of this beach.
